description:
Nathan Parsons has a thing for the supernatural these days.Nathan Parsons近期将会和超自然元素有个约会。

The actor, who was just cast as the replacement for Luke Grimes on True Blood Season 7, will debut later this season on The Originals.这位将会在《真爱如血》第七季中替代Luke Grimes的新演员将会客串本季的《初代吸血鬼》。

Parsons (Bunheads, General Hospital) will first appear on Episode 13 as Jackson, a werewolf friend of Hayley's.Parsons在《初代吸血鬼》中的首次登场将会是本季的13集，他扮演的角色是狼女Hayley的朋友。

According to Zap2It, the character was raised in the bayou and is the leader of his pack. Look for him to stick around for a few episodes.据Zap2it报道，这个角色最开始在河湾地区，是当地狼群的狼首。而且这个角色会在接下来的几集中多次出现。

title: 《初代吸血鬼》新来帅哥插足狼女恋
